musictree.chord

class musictree.chord.Chord(midis: Optional[Union[List[Union[float, int]], List[musictree.midi.Midi], float, int, musictree.midi.Midi]] = None, quarter_duration: Optional[Union[float, int, fractions.Fraction, musictree.quarterduration.QuarterDuration]] = None, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: musictree.core.MusicTree, musictree.quarterduration.QuarterDurationMixin

Chord is a sequence of one or more XMLNotes which occur at the same time in a XMLMeasure of a XMLPart. :param midis: Midi, Midi.value, [Midi, Midi.value] 0 or [0] for a rest. :param quarter_duration: int, float, Fraction, QuarterDuration for duration counted in quarters (crotchets). 0 for grace note (or chord).

property is_rest
Return bool

True if Chord represents a rest, False if otherwise.

property midis
>>> ch = Chord(midis=60)
>>> [type(m) for m in ch.midis]
[<class 'musictree.midi.Midi'>]
>>> [m.value for m in ch.midis]
[60]
>>> ch = Chord(midis=[60, Midi(40)])
>>> [m.value for m in ch.midis]
[60, 40]
>>> Chord([0, 60])
Traceback (most recent call last):
...
ValueError: Chord cannot accept a mixed list of midis of rests and pitches or a list of more than one rests.
Returns

list of midis

property notes
Returns

Chord.get_children() which are of type Note.

property offset
Returns

Offset in Chord’s parent Beat

Return type

QuarterDuration
